rukus.text: 55|46|haey samreab anaknea del ban kaotakhlach nowpel  brachhommoukh champoh mcheasa robsa ke( daembi katsechakdei) ku ttuol ban  thansuokr pir .
55|47|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|48|( thansuokr teangpir noh) mean mekchheu del mean phle krob  braphet .
55|49|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|50|nowknong thansuokr teangpir noh tiet  mean braphp tuk pir haur .
55|51|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|52|nowknong noh tiet der  mean phlechheu krob braphet chea kou  .
55|53|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|54|puokke angkouyophaek khluon now leu pouk del kraloprom am thveu pi sautr  krasa .  haey phlechheu nei thansuokr teangpir noh ku now kber puokke .
55|55|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh

55|56|now leu pouk noh mean sreitepoabsaar cheachraen del min samlung  meul anaknea phe  sa ng krawpi svami robsa puok neang laey del kmean mnoussa lok  ning chin na thleab bahpeal puok neang pimoun puokke( svami) laey .
55|57|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|58|samrosa robsa puok neang  hakdauchchea tbaungottum  ning phkathm .
55|59|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|60|kmean kar tabasnang champoh ampeula krawpi ampeula noh laey .
55|61|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|62|haey krawpi thansuokr teangpir nih  mean thansuokr pir phe  sang  tiet .
55|63|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|64|thansuokr teangpir noh mean pnrbaitng chasa .
55|65|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|66|nowknong thansuokr teangpir noh  mean braphp tuk pir banh tuk  chenh( kmeanochhbchhr) .
55|67|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|68|nowknong thansuokr teangpir noh tiet  mean phlechheu krob braphet  ning phle lmeu  haeyning phle ttum .
55|69|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|70|nowknong thansuokr teangnoh  mean sreitepoabsaar kroblokkha  saa t cheachraen  .
55|71|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|72|ku banda sreitepoabsaar del trauv ban ke theroksaa daoy kng  vongsa nowknong ponlea .
55|73|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|74|del kmean mnoussaalok  ning chin na thleab bahpeal puok neang  pimoun puokke( svami) laey .
55|75|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|76|daoy puokke angkouyophaek now leu khnaey del mean sraom pnrbaitng  promteang kam real prom da la braneit .
55|77|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|78|mha mean porchy neam nei mcheasa robsa anak del mean pheap  khpangkhpasa ning thkomthkaeng .
